docs.title: Getting started
docs.text: SwatahVision provides ready-to-use tools that reduce the complexity of using computer-vision models. Instead of manually handling model loading, inference pipelines, and result visualization, the package offers built-in utilities that make these tasks faster and easier for developers and researchers.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
You can install SwatahVision in a Python>=3.12 environment.

Latest1.1.* 
pip install swatahvision

pip install swatahvision=="1.1.*"
